value.name: Santa Clara Convention Center
value.snippet: The Santa Clara Convention Center is proudly owned by The City of Santa Clara and managed by Oak View Group. We are strategically located in the heart of Silicon Valley, a prime location for conventions, trade shows and exhibitions. deepLinks.name: Discover Santa Clara
deepLinks.snippet: Discover Santa Clara™ serves as the official destination marketing organization for Santa Clara. Discover Santa Clara™ is charged with the marketing, promotion, and selling of Santa Clara and the Santa Clara Convention Center as the destination of choice to national, regional, and local organizations and as a premium destination for conventions, meetings, trade shows, athletics, and group ...

deepLinks.name: Parking and Directions
deepLinks.snippet: Parking at the Santa Clara Convention is free and easy to navigate. Parking services are provided by ACE parking and spaces are directly connected to the center on the third floor. We are located at 5001 Great America Parkway, which is conveniently located right off of the 101 freeway . please use maps displayed for further direction.

value.name: Santa Clara Convention Center | City of Santa Clara
value.snippet: Located at 5001 Great America Parkway, the Santa Clara Convention Center is considered Silicon Valley’s premier convention space due to its centralized location and easy access to some of the world’s top companies. With over 262,000 square feet of flexible meeting spaces, the high-tech facility can accommodate a range of events including ...
